name: Data Weighing Systems
tag_list: sartorius, dillon, crane-scale, scale, balance, weigh, weighing, reel-counter
overview:
Founded in 1977, Data Weighing Systems is a leader in the scale systems industry. Headquartered in Elk Grove, IL, next to Chicago’s O’Hare International Airport, our focus is on industrial weighing and full plant control systems. The company’s mission is to provide our customers with a standard of excellence in equipment and service unrivaled in the scale industry. Corporate Focus:

* Equipment rental for short-term or physical inventory needs
* Service and calibration of weighing and force measurement devices
* Meeting our customers&#8217; needs by helping them sort through thousands of off-the-shelf products
* Customizing solutions to weigh, count, or monitor products throughout the industrial supply chain

Capabilities: Data Weighing Systems brings a wealth of weighing measurement resources, including maintenance, repair, and software design capabilities. Certified weighing consultants deliver and install products that best fit your needs. Then we provide round-the-clock support to enable you to manage more effectively.
